Compass¶

class Compass(server, username, password, options)¶
Arguments:
  • server (string) – The server to connect to. In the form of https://XXX-XXX.compass.education or https://XXX.XXX.jdlf.com.au.
  • username (string) – Your Compass username.
  • password (string) – Your Compass password.
  • options (object) –

    Options used to configure Compass.

    • modules - An array that lists the Compass features to enable. Available options are:
      • news
    • request - An object containing options to pass to request.js. See https://github.com/request/request#requestoptions-callback.
